title: Anodyne 2 - Return to Dust
notes: Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
developer: Analgesic Productions, Melos Han-Tani, Marina Kittaka
description: Traverse a moody, 3D world and surreal 2D spaces, with PSX and 16-bit-influenced art styles. Play as Nova, the Nano Cleaner...
